attributes.action: Cut immigration or stop it completely
attributes.background: Although I sympathise with the people dying whilst trying to get to the UK, I find it hard to ignore the fact that they pass many EU countries to get here. The strain on housing and the national health is affecting people born in this country and others with a British passport. Enough is enough

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106477

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
